MainDoor_97.text: Sceleritas Fel, at your service. A shame our paths have not crossed before, my Master, but now we need never part again.

MainDoor_29.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
MainDoor_29.text: I'm ever so saddened to hear of the trifling little bit of - pardon me - idiocy - that has been imposed upon your poor brain.

MainDoor_75.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
MainDoor_75.text: Just as I held the victim's nethers for your first castration, selected the scalpel for your first eye-gouging, and seasoned the first man you cooked alive, I will take care of you now.

MainDoor_0.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
MainDoor_0.text: Before you go in, one last matter, my fetching felon.
MainDoor_0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Butler looks at you up and down.NodeContext: The butler pauses for a moment,  looking at you up and down

MainDoor_6.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
MainDoor_6.text: I see you are dressed in my raiment.

MainDoor_42.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
MainDoor_42.text: It is an honour that brings a weensy tear to Sceleritas' eye.

MainDoor_58.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
MainDoor_58.text: You should take it off, though. It would be improper to meet Lord Bhaal in the garb of a lowly servant.

MainDoor_48.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
MainDoor_48.text: You truly are the wickeder sibling! I shall be punished for allowing your improper dress, I fear it already!
MainDoor_48.context: CinematicNodeContext: Dark Urge has the standard idle animation where they have their arms folded, looking cocky.

MainDoor_44.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
MainDoor_44.text: There's a puddle of blood on the floor as you walk in, careful, don't slip!

MainDoor_68.speaker: Player
MainDoor_68.text: I'm the child of Bhaal, I do as I please!

MainDoor_106.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
MainDoor_106.text: Eeek! Of course! Wear what you will.

MainDoor_108.speaker: Player
MainDoor_108.text: I'll take it off before I go in.

MainDoor_60.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
MainDoor_60.text: Very good. Every effort should be expended to make a good impression.
MainDoor_60.context: CinematicNodeContext: Cuts to the Butler, the Dark Urge will JUST end up having their hat off once gameplay starts, don't need to show the DU taking it off.

MainDoor_21.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
MainDoor_21.text: A thousand succubae could give me no greater delight!

MainDoor_77.speaker: Player
MainDoor_77.text: What were you doing this whole time?

MainDoor_15.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
MainDoor_15.text: The Temple is all tidied and ready for your worshipful act of mortal combat!

MainDoor_89.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
MainDoor_89.text: The eye sockets of our graven god's icon are all polished up, ready to glow menacingly as you bludgeon your sister to death.

MainDoor_86.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
MainDoor_86.text: I've re-stacked every pile of skulls, and mounted more skeletons on the walls for a cosy touch.

MainDoor_116.speaker: Player
MainDoor_116.text: I went through the whole tribunal when you could have opened the door?!

MainDoor_78.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
MainDoor_78.text: I would have told you, but didn't dream of interrupting when you were enjoying yourself so!

MainDoor_107.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
MainDoor_107.text: Bashing the Hollyphant's wormy trunk was a particularly refined deed.

MainDoor_115.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
MainDoor_115.text: We are unfortunate bunkmates, as she refuses to leave your estate!

MainDoor_113.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
MainDoor_113.text: Every day she kills me as I'm trying to beautify the Temple for your return. Up to thrice, some days.

MainDoor_81.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
MainDoor_81.text: Being killed by you is so much more pleasurable, Master.

MainDoor_85.speaker: Player
MainDoor_85.text: I'm not ready to go into the Temple yet.

MainDoor_28.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
MainDoor_28.text: Let's face facts, Master, you might never be.

MainDoor_4.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
MainDoor_4.text: But I believe in you, now and ever-after.

MainDoor_46.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
MainDoor_46.text: No! Don't leave me to pine!

MainDoor_27.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
MainDoor_27.text: Don't go, Master! Please... don't go.

MainDoor_17.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
MainDoor_17.text: Please go in, my Liege! And take care to watch your step!

MainDoor_31.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
MainDoor_31.text: We can play this game for as long as you wish. But please don't kill me again: I feel a blushing adulterer when I am not dying by Master's hand.

MainDoor_40.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
MainDoor_40.text: If you don't bring the Master soon, I'll put you on Slayer toenail clipping duties for a month.

MainDoor_117.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
MainDoor_117.text: Oh, I jest. I enjoy grooming the beast far too much to let you lay a hand on it.

MainDoor_71.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
MainDoor_71.text: No loitering, no lollygagging, and no trespassing. This is a private estate.

MainDoor_114.speaker: Player
MainDoor_114.text: But it belongs to Orin: she wishes to see me.

MainDoor_119.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
MainDoor_119.text: How dare you so much as whisper the name of that serf, that watery-blooded peasant who pretends to bear the Lord's name?

MainDoor_94.speaker: Player
MainDoor_94.text: Who in the Nine Hells are you?

MainDoor_1.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
MainDoor_1.text: Ah, I am Sceleritas Fel: Butler of Bhaal. I live to die, and die to serve.

MainDoor_45.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
MainDoor_45.text: Although on this eve, I am rather the Doorbeast of Bhaal. I am getting anxious that my Liege is not here yet.

MainDoor_64.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
MainDoor_64.text: This Temple awaits the return of its true Master. A fellow of exceptional sin.

MainDoor_23.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
MainDoor_23.text: Unless Bhaal's true issue is brought before me, I shall not open the door. But you can bring them hither, can't you?

MainDoor_39.speaker: Player
MainDoor_39.text: Gods, are you the reason my friend is acting so strangely?

MainDoor_73.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
MainDoor_73.text: Your friend is special, ingrate, and you should consider yourself the luckiest wretch in the realms to travel with them.

MainDoor_57.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
MainDoor_57.text: Kindly assist the Master in returning home.

MainDoor_51.speaker: Player
MainDoor_51.text: I think that Bhaalspawn is one of my companions.

MainDoor_74.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
MainDoor_74.text: Hnhgh. I wish I had the honour you did of walking toe to toe, always on the very ground itself the Master treads on.
MainDoor_74.context: NodeContext: Quite into the idea of the ground the master walks on

MainDoor_56.speaker: Player
MainDoor_56.text: I've got the amulet, just move aside.

MainDoor_13.speaker: Player
MainDoor_13.text: I've come to kill Orin, and I'll kill you if you get in my way.

MainDoor_33.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
MainDoor_33.text: Brute! It is your ally's destiny: the Chosen of Bhaal must kill their sibling. If your friend does not kill Orin, oh- don't even make me think of it! It's too sad.

MainDoor_41.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
MainDoor_41.text: You do not know Sceleritas. I get killed for fun.

MainDoor_38.speaker: Player
MainDoor_38.text: I wish to enter in fear, and worship the Lord in his sanctum.

MainDoor_69.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
MainDoor_69.text: O, hail, brother, sister, or fellow bosom-cultist.

MainDoor_110.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
MainDoor_110.text: While I would love naught more than to join you in worship, Lord Bhaal requires your aid in another way first.

MainDoor_26.speaker: Player
MainDoor_26.text: Can you open the door for me?

MainDoor_67.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
MainDoor_67.text: Have you no shame nor manners? This door will open only for one grafted from Bhaalian seed.

MainDoor_92.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
MainDoor_92.text: And in you, I detect scant evil seed.

MainDoor_50.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
MainDoor_50.text: One with such base manners as you is certainly unwelcome in my Liege's home.

MainDoor_80.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
MainDoor_80.text: Oh, you simply must go into the Temple, you must! My pattering heart cannot take it any longer!
MainDoor_80.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sceleritas bows lowlyNodeContext: Sceleritas bows lowly

MainDoor_84.speaker: Narrator
MainDoor_84.text: *Stone seals this chamber against the world.*

MainDoor_99.speaker: Minsc
MainDoor_99.text: This is a foul place, better buried. Already Boo is bristling - and not from the cold.
MainDoor_99.context: NodeContext: Growlingly unhappy to be back here

MainDoor_63.speaker: Jaheira
MainDoor_63.text: I confess that the last time I came here, I thought it would be my tomb. You can see why.

MainDoor_7.speaker: Narrator
MainDoor_7.text: *You have Knocked but only a chill answered. The door is open.*
MainDoor_7.context: InternalNodeContext: Knock functionality is removed for now. But could be put back in if needed. 03-03-2023

MainDoor_20.speaker: Narrator
MainDoor_20.text: *With Gortash dead, Orin awaits you in the Temple's nauseating sanctum.*
MainDoor_20.context: InternalNodeContext: Ability to open the door by killing Gortash was removed after a flow review. 09-03-2023

MainDoor_82.speaker: Narrator
MainDoor_82.text: *The Bhaal Amulet trembles in frightened awe.*

MainDoor_93.speaker: Narrator
MainDoor_93.text: *No key, no handle. Better to forget. Better to live.*

MainDoor_37.speaker: Player
MainDoor_37.text: Utter a quick prayer to Bhaal.

MainDoor_105.speaker: Narrator
MainDoor_105.text: *Bhaal cares not for your empty words.*

MainDoor_66.speaker: Narrator
MainDoor_66.text: *Murder, bloody murder. Who else but Bhaal would these symbols honour?*

MainDoor_25.speaker: Narrator
MainDoor_25.text: *You do not discover truth, in these symbols you see only death.*

MainDoor_112.speaker: Player
MainDoor_112.text: Press the Amulet against the door.

MainDoor_9.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player presses the Bhaal Amulet into the door.

MainDoor_103.speaker: Narrator
MainDoor_103.text: *Will you return, once you cross this threshold?*

MainDoor_8.speaker: Narrator
MainDoor_8.text: *The amulet is gone from your possessions. You shall live another day.*

MainDoor_65.speaker: Narrator
MainDoor_65.text: *A chill draught strikes as you turn, as if distant eyes were set watching.*

MainDoor_88.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
MainDoor_88.text: Oh, you must be more of our dire Liege's servants. You are dressed in attire demonstrating your respect for the Master.

MainDoor_95.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
MainDoor_95.text: But why come to the Master's estate without them? Have you abandoned them? Or are you here to help with the skull-stacking and corpse-mounting?

MainDoor_61.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
MainDoor_61.text: If the latter, you are tardy. I've done all the work myself. Just go and fetch our honoured Bhaalspawn.

MainDoor_36.speaker: Player
MainDoor_36.text: I'll be back with the Urge.

MainDoor_30.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
MainDoor_30.text: The royal Itch, the regal Tingle, the unending Thirst. Oh, I adore them so.

MainDoor_98.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
MainDoor_98.text: Ooo, if you dare rob Master of their birthright, you will have Bhaal to answer to! As genocidal maniacs go, he is not the nicest!

AD_CombatStart_0.speaker: Orin
AD_CombatStart_0.text: At last, slaughter kin. I will show you how Father loves me. I will score it into your bones.

AD_CombatStart_1.speaker: Orin
AD_CombatStart_1.text: Here it comes at last, craving crimson and carnage. So be it.

Orin_33.speaker: Orin
Orin_33.text: Hush hush. I hear footsteps trip-trapping on the Murder Lord's stones.
Orin_33.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player approaches as Orin transports herself close to the altar. She whispers to Yenna on the altar, who appears to be lying in a restful sleep, unharmed.NodeContext: As though she's quieting the victim on the altar. Addressing the abductee, but really speaking for the player's benefit

Orin_54.speaker: Orin
Orin_54.text: Hush hush. I hear footsteps trip-trapping on the Murder Lord's stones.
Orin_54.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player approaches as Orin transports herself close to the altar. She whispers to the altar victim, who appears to be lying in a restful sleep, unharmed.NodeContext: As though she's quieting the victim on the altar. Addressing the abductee, but really speaking for the player's benefit

Orin_124.speaker: Orin
Orin_124.text: It lied to me. It lets the tyrant live and comes crawling into Bhaal's sanctum instead.
Orin_124.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin pretends to be saying this to the altar character, but keeps her eyes on the player - it's definitely aimed at them.NodeContext: Leaning close to the abductee, but speaking to the player. Pissed off that the player refused her.

Orin_106.speaker: Orin
Orin_106.text: I know what you did. Spilled my grandfather's crimson... He was mine. He showed me how to slice and slit. He guides my daggers still.
Orin_106.context: NodeContext: A vicious but contained grief - she's genuinely disturbed by his death, but this isn't a feeling she's had before, so she's suppressing it.

Orin_36.speaker: Orin
Orin_36.text: Did it think it could protect? Did it think it could save? Only the blades can offer salvation.
Orin_36.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Orin leans over the player's companion on their altar, admires their form. She draws her daggers, places the tip of one blade at the abductee's exposed throat.NodeContext: Hushed, as though to companion on altar, but really for player's benefit. Mocking player's intentions. On  the cusp of killing the victim. 'It' is player.

Orin_122.speaker: Player
Orin_122.text: Like the salvation your mother offered? She attacked you on Sarevok's orders.

Orin_142.speaker: Player
Orin_142.text: Like the salvation your mother offered? She attacked you on Sarevok's orders.

Orin_192.speaker: Player
Orin_192.text: Like your mother's punishment? She attacked you on Sarevok's orders.

Orin_173.speaker: Player
Orin_173.text: Like the salvation your mother offered? She attacked you on Sarevok's orders. Your father's orders...

Orin_57.speaker: Player
Orin_57.text: Like the salvation your mother offered? She attacked you on Sarevok's orders. Your father's orders...

Orin_168.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin releases the altar victim and leaps down (reuse of existing moment)

Orin_94.speaker: Player
Orin_94.text: Like your mother's punishment? She attacked you on Sarevok's orders. Your father's orders...

Orin_110.speaker: Player
Orin_110.text: Gortash is dead. I left him rotting on the roof of his fortress.

Orin_125.speaker: Orin
Orin_125.text: You do not smell of his corpse-rot. But yes - I feel it. He is grave meat now.
Orin_125.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin closes her eyes, inhales - trying to sense if you speak the truthNodeContext: unbelieving, but then thinking she has some otherworldly sense of his death - delighted

Orin_153.speaker: Orin
Orin_153.text: Liar. LIAR! He still sucks air in his rock-rotten fortress.
Orin_153.context: NodeContext:  A flash of Orin's most violent, petulant side. She's really pissed off at the player.

Orin_112.speaker: Orin
Orin_112.text: You disobeyed the Murder Lord. He will be compensated.
Orin_112.context: NodeContext: Pissed off at you, excited to make the kill of the companion on the altar

Orin_163.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin raises her duel daggers  high and SLAMS them into the victim's skull, one through each eye. The victim opens their mouth, splutters and dies.  Orin drags her blades free, giggling.NodeContext: Emote. The altar victim is on the verge of death, horrifically brutalised and with their tongue cut out. We need a short emote for when Orin flips their head over, to tell us that they're still alive.

Orin_47.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin raises her duel daggers  high and SLAMS them into Yenna's skull, one through each eye - we look away, seeing the player's horrified reaction. Orin drags her blades free, giggling.NodeContext: Emote. The altar victim is on the verge of death, horrifically brutalised and with their tongue cut out. We need a short emote for when Orin flips their head over, to tell us that they're still alive.

Orin_102.speaker: Orin
Orin_102.text: Not good enough. No gristle, no meat, poor clay for sculpting an atrocity.
Orin_102.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin leaps from the altar, prowls towards the player. She licks the blood from her right-hand dagger, then sheathes both (sheathing can be off-camera if needs be.)NodeContext: Tasting the blood on her blade. Sneering, unsatisfied

Orin_84.speaker: Player
Orin_84.text: Disgusting creature. You'll pay for what you did here.

Orin_187.speaker: Orin
Orin_187.text: Now it is your turn on the slab. Your turn to watch the veins split and bones break.
Orin_187.context: NodeContext: Turning on the  player - building the sense of threat

Orin_169.speaker: Player
Orin_169.text: Call yourself a murderer. A flumph could do worse.

Orin_183.speaker: Orin
Orin_183.text: I was only wetting the blades.
Orin_183.context: NodeContext: "That was nothing", referring to her murdering the victim on the altar

Orin_51.speaker: Orin
Orin_51.text: I have skinned and cleaved and corrupted, set hooks to living flesh and torn, spilled the gore from thousands.
Orin_51.context: NodeContext: Bigging herself up, "You have no idea what I'm capable of"

Orin_145.speaker: Player
Orin_145.text: Offer a prayer for your departed companion's soul.

Orin_154.speaker: Orin
Orin_154.text: Only Bhaal listens now. Your prayers are bitter salt and ash - they are nothing.

Orin_37.speaker: Orin
Orin_37.text: What's the matter? Is its mouth meat all tangled? Too trembly to wag its word flap at me?

Orin_30.speaker: Orin
Orin_30.text: Your murder should have been exquisite. A crypt-born effigy to greet Bhaal's bleeding dawn. And now it will be nothing.
Orin_30.context: NodeContext: Anger coming back out - the player ruined her plans. Venomous.

Orin_105.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player draws their weapon/adopts a fighting stance.

Orin_196.speaker: Player
Orin_196.text: Anything you do to him, I will inflict on you a hundredfold.

Orin_147.speaker: Player
Orin_147.text: Anything you do to her, I will inflict on you a hundredfold.

Orin_92.speaker: Orin
Orin_92.text: Yes yes give me agony. Pluck me bone from socket. Stroke me with a jagged edge until my skin shreds wet and red.
Orin_92.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin steps away from the altar, prowls towards the player, sheathing her daggers. (sheathing can be off-camera if needs be.)NodeContext: Amused/loves the idea the player is going to hurt her. Her blood and pain will only make her more worthy of Bhaal.

Orin_190.speaker: Orin
Orin_190.text: A sharp lamb to be sacrificed, but your cruelty makes the crimson sweeter.

Orin_16.speaker: Orin
Orin_16.text: Just like Gortash - all air, no mettle. Flap your jaw all you like - your vapours hold no threat for me.

Orin_108.speaker: Player
Orin_108.text: You said Bhaal wanted us to fight. He will reject this offering.

Orin_14.speaker: Orin
Orin_14.text: You do not lie, underling. It is your blood I am destined to spill. Your death spit will stain these walls, little lamb.
Orin_14.context: NodeContext: Approving/accepting - focused on the thought of killing the player instead.

Orin_178.speaker: Orin
Orin_178.text: You think you know Bhaal's will. Then why did you not follow it?

Orin_28.speaker: Player
Orin_28.text: I did what you asked. I killed Gortash, so let her go.

Orin_207.speaker: Player
Orin_207.text: I did what you asked. I killed Gortash, so let him go.

Orin_95.speaker: Player
Orin_95.text: His fate is of no interest to me.

Orin_156.speaker: Orin
Orin_156.context: NodeContext: With a smile -about to commit horrible murder

Orin_171.speaker: Orin
Orin_171.text: Sticky sweet, but nothing special. Just like you.
Orin_171.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin leaps from the altar, prowls towards the player. She licks the blood from her right-hand dagger, then sheathes both (sheathing can be off-camera if needs be.)NodeContext: Tasting the blood on her blade. Sneering, unsatisfied

Orin_9.speaker: Player
Orin_9.text: Her fate is of no interest to me.

Orin_193.speaker: Orin
Orin_193.context: NodeContext: With a smile -about to commit horrible murder

Orin_191.speaker: Orin
Orin_191.text: It refused the Murder Lord's command, and comes crawling into his sanctum with the tyrant unpulped.
Orin_191.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin pretends to be saying this to the altar character, but keeps her eyes on the player - it's definitely aimed at them.NodeContext: Leaning close to the abductee, but speaking to the player. Pissed off that the player refused her.

Orin_64.speaker: Orin
Orin_64.text: Loosen the bonds, sweet meat. Bhaal does not crave the taste of bait on his altar.
Orin_64.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin transports herself to the altar, keeping the victim between herself and the player. She coos in the victim's unlistening ear. Off-screen, the player repositions to a default position a little way from the altar (out of physical reach)NodeContext: Mocking the player  for saving their companion - it was never about them

Orin_91.speaker: Orin
Orin_91.text: Look at it, sneaking and snivelling in the shadows.
Orin_91.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin transports herself to the altar, keeping the victim between herself and the player. She coos in the victim's unlistening ear. Off-screen, the player repositions to a default position a little way from the altar (out of physical reach)NodeContext: Sneering, the player failed to free the victim from the altar

Orin_119.speaker: Orin
Orin_119.text: But wait. You are not the one I asked for. My blood kin has refused our Father's sport. A mind-mangled coward after all.
Orin_119.context: NodeContext: Not seeing the Dark Urge, realising she's been denied. Judging them.

Orin_1.speaker: Orin
Orin_1.text: How much the worm has feasted since I slipped it into its skull. All that plotting, the years of dominating this temple - forgotten.
Orin_1.context: NodeContext: smirking - this was too easy. Key info for players - confirms elements of the Dark Urge's past.

Orin_174.speaker: Orin
Orin_174.text: Now it sends you to spill my crimson into the soil. Silly, stupid slaughter kin. I will not be denied.
Orin_174.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin transports herself to the altar, keeping the victim between herself and the player. She coos in the victim's unlistening ear.NodeContext: Pissed off at you, excited to make the kill of the companion on the altar

Orin_66.speaker: Orin
Orin_66.text: No trust in my promises, but I smell the tyrant's corpse-reek. You are steeped in his rot.
Orin_66.context: NodeContext: slightly scolding - "I can't believe you didn't trust me, but you killed him anyway, so all his forgiven"

Orin_100.speaker: Orin
Orin_100.context: CinematicNodeContext: SFX for LOW_BhaalTemple_PostBattle. Aligns with node N4 (UUID c378a901-496c-b66b-ddc3-763de09ea941) - Orin-as-slayer collapsing in a pool of blood.NodeContext: Orin giggles as she finally collapses into a pool of blood. A strange, haunting sound - as though she enjoyed being slaughtered.

Orin_155.speaker: Orin
Orin_155.text: Loosen the bonds, sweet meat. Bhaal does not crave the taste of bait on his altar.
Orin_155.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin 'transports' herself to the altar, standing over the victim. The player backs away from the altar.NodeContext: Mocking the player  for saving their companion - it was never about them

Orin_78.speaker: Orin
Orin_78.text: But wait. You are not the one I asked for. My blood kin has refused our Father's sport. A mind-mangled coward after all.
Orin_78.context: NodeContext: Not seeing the Dark Urge, realising she's been denied. Judging them.

Orin_131.speaker: Orin
Orin_131.text: How much the worm has feasted since I slipped it into its skull. All that plotting, the years of dominating this temple - forgotten.
Orin_131.context: NodeContext: smirking - this was too easy. Key info for players - confirms elements of the Dark Urge's past.

Orin_58.speaker: Orin
Orin_58.text: Now it sends you to spill my crimson into the soil. Silly, stupid slaughter kin. It will never be Bhaal's Chosen now.
Orin_58.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin leaps from the altar, prowls towards the playerNodeContext: smirking - this was too easy. Key info for players - confirms elements of the Dark Urge's past.

Orin_42.speaker: Orin
Orin_42.text: He wanted your flesh, dripping with the tyrant's pain, coated in the Bone Lord's ash, but you have failed him.
Orin_42.context: NodeContext: Judging the player - they should have killed Gortash and Ketheric first. Now they are nothing.

Orin_204.speaker: Orin
Orin_204.text: I smell it. Gortash's corpse-stain. His killer approaches.
Orin_204.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin transports herself to the altar, keeping the victim between herself and the player. She coos in the victim's unlistening ear.NodeContext: Speaking close into victim's ear, but referring to the player (the 'killer' approaching)

Orin_7.speaker: Orin
Orin_7.text: See how good I was? How patient while you drained the tyrant's juices for me?
Orin_7.context: NodeContext: Still close to victim, addressing player. Referring to fact she refrained from killing the abductee

Orin_148.speaker: Orin
Orin_148.text: But Sarevok's crimson was not yours to spill. He was mine. You had no right to take him.
Orin_148.context: NodeContext: A vicious but contained grief - she's genuinely disturbed by his death, but this isn't a feeling she's had before, so she's suppressing it.

Orin_59.speaker: Orin
Orin_59.text: I left the blood inside, the pelt unskinned. But I had such plans for this one, and the blade was made to slice...
Orin_59.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin grabs the companion's head again, She draws her daggers, placing the tip of one blade at their exposed throat. A drop of blood trickles down.NodeContext: Longing, playful - on the cusp of unleashhing her violence. All refering to the victim on the slab, but speaking to the player

Orin_140.speaker: Player
Orin_140.text: We had a deal. I killed Gortash, so let Gale go.

Orin_2.speaker: Player
Orin_2.text: We had a deal. I killed Gortash, so let Halsin go.

Orin_141.speaker: Orin
Orin_141.text: Yes yes we did. We made a pact, sealed in Father's sight.
Orin_141.context: NodeContext: Reluctantly giving up the chance to kill the abductee on the altar

Orin_22.speaker: Orin
Orin_22.text: You are the one Bhaal craves. Yours is the crimson that should clot my altar.
Orin_22.context: NodeContext: Orin stands up and prowls towards the player, smiling. Setting them in her sights.

Orin_161.speaker: Orin
Orin_161.text: All the lordling's pretty plans, bleeding out in the gutters. And soon your crimson will join his.

Orin_23.speaker: Orin
Orin_23.text: I will finish what my grandfather started. Sarevok brought this city to its knees, but I will be the one to slit its throat. I am Bhaal's Chosen.

Orin_208.speaker: Player
Orin_208.text: You shouldn't listen to Sarevok. He ordered your mother to kill you, and lied to you about your heritage. You're his granddaughter and his daughter.

Orin_76.speaker: Player
Orin_76.text: Sarevok ordered your mother to kill you. Why follow his path?

Orin_39.speaker: Player
Orin_39.text: You shouldn't listen to Sarevok. He lied to you all along. You're not just his granddaughter, you're also his daughter.

Orin_88.speaker: Orin
Orin_88.text: No no NO NO NO! He didn't. He didn't... Filthy, pig-mouthed little LIAR!
Orin_88.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin pauses, for a moment dumbstruck. Her focus is now fully on the player. This has hit a nerveNodeContext: Processing this information - this is driving her over the edge. She can't believe this. She won't.

Orin_17.speaker: Orin
Orin_17.text: Grandfather loved me. He worshipped me. These petty smearings will not save you.
Orin_17.context: NodeContext: Processing this information - this is driving her over the edge. She can't believe this. She won't.

Orin_176.speaker: Orin
Orin_176.text: Grandfather loves me. He worships me. How dare you smear his name? It will not save you.
Orin_176.context: NodeContext: Processing this information - this is driving her over the edge. She can't believe this. She won't.

Orin_180.speaker: Player
Orin_180.text: You're pathetic. No wonder he tricked you so easily.

Orin_89.speaker: Player
Orin_89.text: Sarevok told me the truth himself. He was laughing at you.

Orin_15.speaker: Orin
Orin_15.text: No. Not him. Not him... I did all this for him. Everything... everything...
Orin_15.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin freezes for a moment. This can't be true. NodeContext: Genuine doubt creeping in. This is breaking every truth she believes about herself and her purpose.

Orin_85.speaker: Bhaal Avatar
Orin_85.text: No, Orin. You did this for me.
Orin_85.context: CinematicNodeContext: An unseen voice speak out. Orin begins to jerk, her face contorted. She (involuntarily) transforms into the slayer.NodeContext: Unseen. Commanding. Condemning.

Orin_103.speaker: Orin
Orin_103.text: Bhaal... Father, they lie to me. They lie!
Orin_103.context: NodeContext: reacting to hearing Bhaal's voice in the temple. Almost childlke, she can't handle this

Orin_186.speaker: Bhaal Avatar
Orin_186.text: Hush, child. No more doubts, no more fears, no more Orin. Become murder.
Orin_186.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin begins to jerk, her face contorted. She (involuntarily) transforms into the slayer.NodeContext: Unseen. Commanding. Condemning.Turning Orin into the slayer.

Orin_116.speaker: Orin
Orin_116.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin roars, filling the temple with the sound of her screams. The player gets ready to fight.NodeContext: Will require SFX once shea's fully transformed. Option to record a battle cry/scream that transforms into the SFX roar.

Orin_129.speaker: Player
Orin_129.text: Sarevok's your father, Orin. He abused your mother. He abused you.

Orin_170.speaker: Player
Orin_170.text: Bhaal rejoices in such cruel betrayals. You really believed you were the exception?

Orin_128.speaker: Orin
Orin_128.context: NodeContext: Vicious, rejecting everything the player is saying

Orin_121.speaker: Orin
Orin_121.text: Your skin will be grandfather's shroud, coward. I will flay you where you stand.
Orin_121.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin pulses with Bhaal's energy. She transforms into her slayer form, grotesque and terrifying. The player draws their weapon, recoiling.NodeContext: Furious, brimming with hatred. She'll transform into the slayer at the end of this line

Orin_21.speaker: Orin
Orin_21.text: Your skin will be grandfather's shroud, coward. I will flay you where you stand.
Orin_21.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin draws her blades, ready for combat. She smiles.NodeContext: Threatening/eyes shining. Energized. Combat about to begin.

Orin_97.speaker: Player
Orin_97.text: I'm not the one who needs saving.

Orin_98.speaker: Orin
Orin_98.text: You hold no threat for me. Nor do your petty little vapours.
Orin_98.context: NodeContext: Dismissive, riled up. Getting ready to attack the player

Orin_137.speaker: Player
Orin_137.text: You will fail as Sarevok did. As all Bhaalspawn are destined to fail.

Orin_133.speaker: Orin
Orin_133.text: He did not fail. He carved the bedrock on which I will erect Bhaal's cathedral.

Orin_41.speaker: Orin
Orin_41.text: When I set my blades to your neck, the Murder Lord will taste my domination. His true Chosen, born of butchery. One fit to control the Crown.
Orin_41.context: NodeContext: What Orin truly wants, so nearly within her grasp

Orin_203.speaker: Player
Orin_203.text: So you're just continuing the family business? How original.

Orin_194.speaker: Orin
Orin_194.text: He watches over me. He worships me. He built the foundations on which I'll carve Bhaal's succession.

Orin_209.speaker: Player
Orin_209.text: And what part do the stones play in this 'plan' of yours?

Orin_143.speaker: Orin
Orin_143.text: When the brain bows to me, so will the Absolute's mob. Baldur's Gate will be Bhaal's cathedral, and my slaughter-horde will worship here.

Orin_179.speaker: Orin
Orin_179.text: When this city heaves its final breath, we will march on to the next. And the next. And the next.
Orin_179.context: NodeContext: Like it's a secret, truly horrifying - she will never stop

Orin_69.speaker: Orin
Orin_69.text: Come to me, Father. Set my flesh to your unholy purpose.
Orin_69.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin pulses with Bhaal's energy. She transforms into her slayer form, grotesque and terrifying. The player draws their weapon, recoiling.NodeContext: Invoking her god's powers, calling out to him

Orin_167.speaker: Orin
Orin_167.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin roars, filling the temple with the sound of her screams. The player gets ready to fight.NodeContext: Will require SFX once shea's fully transformed. Option to record a battle cry/scream that transforms into the SFX roar.

Orin_123.speaker: Orin
Orin_123.text: The Murder Lord's blessing will be mine, once I peel the skin from your carcass.
Orin_123.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin draws her blades, ready for combat. She smiles.NodeContext: Threatening/eyes shining. Energized. Combat about to begin.

Orin_44.speaker: Player
Orin_44.text: Baldur's Gate deserves such a fate. Your vision is exquisite.

Orin_132.speaker: Orin
Orin_132.text: And your crimson will be the first to bless its stones.

Orin_3.speaker: Orin
Orin_3.text: Yes yes. Bhaal shudders beneath us. He calls our crimson forth. He will be sated.
Orin_3.context: NodeContext: Recognising the player's bloodlust - Orin likes it. Building anticipation, eager to please her god

Orin_31.speaker: Player
Orin_31.text: We had a deal. I killed Gortash, so let Lae'zel go.

Orin_83.speaker: Player
Orin_83.text: We had a deal. I killed Gortash, so let Minthara go.

Orin_45.speaker: Player
Orin_45.text: We had a deal. I killed Gortash, so let Yenna go.

Orin_8.speaker: Player
Orin_8.text: Harm him and I swear I'll do tenfold worse to you.

Orin_81.speaker: Orin
Orin_81.text: Is your skull thick with thoughts about your blade in my belly? Cutting and cutting and cutting.
Orin_81.context: NodeContext: Likes the idea they fantasize about killing her

Orin_206.speaker: Orin
Orin_206.text: Shred me. Tear me. It is Bhaal's blood you spill from my flesh. And you might, now the tyrant rots.
Orin_206.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin stands up and prowls towards the player, smilingNodeContext: Likes the idea of her own pain as much as causing someone else's. Setting her sights on the player now. 'Tyrant' is Gortash.

Orin_113.speaker: Player
Orin_113.text: Harm her and I swear I'll do tenfold worse to you.

Orin_152.speaker: Player
Orin_152.text: Go ahead. I won't stop you.

Orin_52.speaker: Orin
Orin_52.text: You long for me, don't you? You crave the feeling of my blades against your skin.
Orin_52.context: NodeContext: Likes the idea they share a special connection, that killing the player will be special

Orin_62.speaker: Orin
Orin_62.text: You will be next. Your blood will clot the gutters of this place, your flesh will rot on the slab. A worthy offering at last.
Orin_62.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin stands up and prowls towards the player, smilingNodeContext: Just killed the victim on the altar.  Her blood's pumping now - she's already longing for the next kill. Has her sights on the player.

Orin_65.speaker: Orin
Orin_65.text: But you did not listen. Thought my instructions could be ignored. I told you what to do, whelp worm, and you disobeyed.
Orin_65.context: NodeContext: the player failed Orin's instructions in one of several non-specific

Orin_151.speaker: Orin
Orin_151.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin leans over the player's companion on their altar, admires their form. She draws her daggers, places the tip of one blade at the abductee's exposed throat.NodeContext: Whispered to the comapnion on the altar, but intended for the player. She's been punished for her own disobedience countless times before, and enjoys doling this out to others.

Orin_26.speaker: Orin
Orin_26.text: You knew the Murder Lord could not be denied his meat.
Orin_26.context: NodeContext: Still close to abductee. Referring to fact player initially refused to kill Gortash. Hint of a threat, given she has her own 'meat' (the abductee) ready for sacrifice

InWorldAbduction_Yenna_5.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player stops, confused, as Yenna comes running towards them out of the undercity shadows. She is bloodied and bruised, limping as though she'd been seriously hurt, shouting back into the darkness. In the distance, we hear a woman giggling. (Orin - emote recorded within Nested dialogue). It's terrifying.NodeContext: Shouting back at someone chasing her

InWorldAbduction_Yenna_20.text: Are you real? Is it really you? You have to help me - please!

InWorldAbduction_Yenna_6.text: A scary lady. She - she said her name was O-Orin.

InWorldAbduction_Yenna_10.text: She - she found me and my cat Grub, snatched us off the streets and - and -

InWorldAbduction_Yenna_15.context: NodeContext: absolute horror/trauma - this was her beloved pet she ate

InWorldAbduction_Yenna_1.text: Then she told me to start running. She said when she catches me she's going to - to eat me too.

InWorldAbduction_Yenna_7.text: She's coming. Oh please, please - don't let her take me!
InWorldAbduction_Yenna_7.context: CinematicNodeContext: Another giggle. Louder. Closer. Yenna turn to look, terrified, then takes a step towards the player -

InWorldAbduction_Yenna_11.speaker: Player
InWorldAbduction_Yenna_11.text: I won't let anything happen to you. I promise.

InWorldAbduction_Yenna_3.text: Silly silly, making promises you can't keep...

InWorldAbduction_Yenna_0.speaker: Player
InWorldAbduction_Yenna_0.text: Stay with me. I'll get you out of here.

InWorldAbduction_Yenna_21.text: Fleeing on the heels of a babe. I thought you were stronger than that.

InWorldAbduction_Yenna_14.speaker: Player
InWorldAbduction_Yenna_14.text: Sounds like she's getting really close. Better start running...

InWorldAbduction_Yenna_8.text: You'd stand by and let an innocent face my blades? Good.

InWorldAbduction_Yenna_22.speaker: Player
InWorldAbduction_Yenna_22.text: What makes you think you're safer with me?

InWorldAbduction_Yenna_12.text: What would you do? Spill the blood of such an innocent? You'll get your chance.

InWorldAbduction_Yenna_25.text: I - I thought you were her. O-Orin - the lady who took me. She can make herself look like anyone. She's a monster.

InWorldAbduction_Yenna_4.speaker: Player
InWorldAbduction_Yenna_4.text: Slow down. First tell me what you're doing down here.

InWorldAbduction_Yenna_18.speaker: Player
InWorldAbduction_Yenna_18.text: Do not dare issue commands to me, whelp.

InWorldAbduction_Yenna_16.text: Please! You have to! O-Orin is coming for me.

InWorldAbduction_Yenna_26.speaker: Player
InWorldAbduction_Yenna_26.text: It's all right. You're safe now.

InWorldAbduction_Yenna_13.text: No, I'm not. She's coming. Orin is coming!

Cultist_06_0.speaker: Death's Head of Bhaal Eni
Cultist_06_0.text: Look on this corpse as you would look on perfection. The curve of laceration... Refined. Beautiful.

Cultist_06_1.speaker: Death's Head of Bhaal Eni
Cultist_06_1.text: Bhaal is never wrong. You are his will incarnate. Where you lead, I will follow. I will learn.

Cultist_06_7.speaker: Death's Head of Bhaal Eni
Cultist_06_7.text: Please, step closer. Take a look. We have much to learn from Orin's techniques.

Cultist_06_3.speaker: Death's Head of Bhaal Eni
Cultist_06_3.text: I thought you were his Chosen... But you are nothing.

Cultist_06_4.speaker: Death's Head of Bhaal Eni
Cultist_06_4.text: I eagerly await your fray... To study two masters at work.

Cultist_06_5.speaker: Death's Head of Bhaal Eni
Cultist_06_5.text: You killed her. You killed her. I thought it not possible, and yet... Curious.
Cultist_06_5.context: NodeContext: Losing control - a flash of the unbridled rage that leads him to commit his murders

Cultist_06_6.speaker: Death's Head of Bhaal Eni
Cultist_06_6.text: I hear you have returned to do battle with Lady Orin... To tear each other's flesh from bone in his name. Reverence.
Cultist_06_6.context: NodeContext: Awestruck, scared of what this might mean

Cultist_06_8.speaker: Death's Head of Bhaal Eni
Cultist_06_8.text: Orin is so imaginative in her methods. This one gave out such sickening screams.

Cultist_06_9.speaker: Death's Head of Bhaal Eni
Cultist_06_9.text: My kills are not yet refined. I am too passionate. Too emotional. Too personal. But... soon.
